Eric Schmidt said that although what he called the`` triumvirate approach'' of leadership by himself, Larry Page and Sergey Brin has real benefits, it is time to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability. Eric Schmidt became CEO of Google in July 2001, when he'd already been chairman of the board for several months-- Google put him on the board and made him chairman in March of that year.
